title: The Mystery at Hogwarts
description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione discover a dark plot threatening Hogwarts. They must work together to uncover the truth and stop the danger before it's too late.

beats.title: Strange Suspicions
beats.description: Harry has been having strange dreams and his scar has been hurting. The trio discusses recent odd occurrences at Hogwarts. Something doesn't feel right, and they need to figure out what's going on.
objectives: Share concerns about recent strange events
Discuss Harry's scar pain and what it might mean
Decide to investigate the mysterious happenings
Make a plan for what to do next

beats.title: Gathering Information
beats.description: The trio has decided to research what might be happening. They need to visit the library, talk to teachers, or find other ways to gather information about the threats they're sensing.
objectives: Plan how to gather it without arousing suspicion
Split up tasks or decide to work together
Set a time and place to reconvene

beats.title: Discovering the Truth
beats.description: They've gathered clues and information. Now they need to piece together what's really happening and what danger Hogwarts faces. The truth is more serious than they thought.
objectives: Share what each person has learned
Connect the dots and realize the real threat
Understand the stakes and danger involved
Decide if they should tell a teacher or handle it themselves
